content: I'll definitely give those bands a listen. I've been really into discovering new music lately, and I've been using the "Discover Weekly" and "Release Radar" playlists on Spotify to find new artists and songs. Last week, I discovered a new artist called Tameca Jones, and I've been listening to her album "Leave It Alone" non-stop. Her music is a great mix of soul, R&B, and indie rock, and I've been recommending it to all my friends.
